scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/*.html dist && cp -r src/rewardImages dist && cp -r src/rpg/*.html dist && cp -r src/rpg/assets dist && bun build ./src/app.ts ./src/index.ts ./src/practice.ts ./src/rpg/rpg.ts --outdir dist
